title: LeBron James' Story Is A Tale Of Two Cities
teaser: The cities of Miami and Cleveland now have at least one more thing in common: Loving and losing NBA star LeBron James.
contentencoded:
South Florida's Big Three era has come to an end. In a personal essay that ran on Sports Illustrated's website Friday, LeBron James announced that he was headed back to his home state to play for the Cleveland Cavaliers.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Kenny Malone of WLRN says LeBron’s story has always been a tale of two cities.
